metadata.title: CVE-2024-43444 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Passwords of agents and customers are displayed in plain text in the OTRSadmin log module if certain configurations regarding the authenticationsources match and debugging for the authentication backend has beenenabled.This issue affects:  *  OTRS from 7.0.X through 7.0.50  *  OTRS 8.0.X  *  OTRS 2023.X  *  OTRS from 2024.X through 2024.5.X  *  ((OTRS)) Community Edition: 6.0.xProducts based on the ((OTRS)) Community Edition also very likely to beaffected

criterions.comment: znuny package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
